name: OwlNoise
0:
”Alexa open Owl Noise”
”Alexa ask Owl Noise to play for 8 hours”
”Alexa, pause”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: owl noise
des:
Enjoy the calming and mysterious calls of the night owl. Perfect for creating a serene nighttime ambiance, these owl sounds can aid relaxation, sleep, or simply bring a touch of nature to your environment.

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" and select Owl Noise
6. Choose Device to perform the routine and save.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
